ygData.subject: Release schedule
ygData.msgSnippet: The Archive Web Group had a meeting here this morning and hashed out the following rough release plan.  We thought the list would be interested to hear what

Subject: Release schedule
X-Yahoo-Group-Post: member; u=168599281

The Archive Web Group had a meeting here this morning and hashed out the 
following rough release plan.  We thought the list would be interested 
to hear what was decided.

We'll probably make a 1.0.6 with a fix for "[ 1028913 ] End-of-crawl 
reports no happen (Stuck StatLogger): 
https://sourceforge.net/tracker/index.php?func=detail&aid=1028913&group_id=73833&atid=539099" 
this week or early next week (We're still trying to figure why no 
reports at the end-of-crawl).

We're planning to code-freeze a 1.2 release around October 1st.  We'll 
then run it through our test cycle which comprises generally of a week 
of test crawls followed by a week of production crawls (A rough Test 
Plan can be found here: 
http://crawler.archive.org/cgi-bin/wiki.pl?CrawlTestPlan).  1.2 will 
have the priority 8 and above features from the RFE list which can be 
found here: 
https://sourceforge.net/tracker/?group_id=73833&atid=539102.  It will 
also have bugs that are priority 8 and above fixed from the bugs list 
which can be found here: 
https://sourceforge.net/tracker/?group_id=73833&atid=539099.

Comments?

Thanks,
St.Ack
